author: jkuhnert
msg: Bug fix for TAPESTRY-1071. The dojo validation was being configured to expect a seperator for numbers
when none was specified in the translator..Thus blowing up the parsing of number on the server if a seperator
was used and passed correctly. Now check the format.isGrouping method.
Fixe(s) for TAPESTRY-1069. The native js call of form.submit() doesn't actually invoke any event listeners. Solution
was to fabricate an event using the native platform method (different for IE and moz for instance) to make
sure the normal event bubbling cycle happens. Tested on ff / ie/ opera / konqueror(safari) .
